notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: I.M.A.B., W.D.K., K.B.-G., I.H., I.K., L.N., T.W., D.M.D., M.S. were involved in conceiving the general ideas. I.M.A.B., W.D.K., D.M.D. and M.S. conceived and designed the study. D.M.D., I.M.A.B and T.T. collected the data. I.M.A.B. performed the analysis with input from W.D.K. and M.S. All authors (I.M.A.B., W.D.K., K.B.-G., I.H., I.K., L.N., T.T., T.W., D.M.D., M.S.) discussed the results. I.M.A.B. wrote the first draft of the manuscript with input from W.D.K. and M.S. All authors commented on the manuscript and approved the final version of the manuscript.
